document.full_text: the broadway musical "the book of mormon" earned 12 drama desk nominations on friday - twice as many as the rival broadway shows "catch me if you can" and "women on the verge of a nervous breakdown."
document.title: 'book of mormon' leads drama desk nominations with 12
lines_and_colors: the broadway musical "the book of mormon" earned 12 drama desk nominations on friday - twice as many as the rival broadway shows "catch me if you can" and "women on the verge of a nervous breakdown."
